languages.text: "Взгляните на меня, Ваша Светлость — в руках дырки, ноги не держат. Если бы не мои раны, этот ублюдок уже давно бы щеголял свежей дыркой в башке. Поймите меня верно, я не боюсь умереть — я боюсь промахнуться".

traits.locale_text: "Взгляните на меня, Ваша Светлость — в руках дырки, ноги не держат. Если бы не мои раны, этот ублюдок уже давно бы щеголял свежей дыркой в башке. Поймите меня верно, я не боюсь умереть — я боюсь промахнуться".
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

languages.text: "Just look at me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I have holes in my arms. My legs can't support my weight. If not for these wounds, that freak would already have a pretty new hole in his head. It's not the dying I'm afraid of, mind you — it's missing the mark."
languages.original_text: "Взгляните на меня, Ваша Светлость — в руках дырки, ноги не держат. Если бы не мои раны, этот ублюдок уже давно бы щеголял свежей дыркой в башке. Поймите меня верно, я не боюсь умереть — я боюсь промахнуться".

traits.locale_text: "Have a look at me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I have holes in my arms. My legs can't support my own weight. If not for these wounds, that freak would have already received a pretty new hole in his head. It's not dying I'm afraid of, mind you — it's missing the mark."
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

traits.locale_text: "Have a look at me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I have holes in my arms. My legs can't support my own weight. If not for these wounds, that freak would have already received a pretty new hole in his head. It's not dying I'm afraid of, mind you — it's missing the mark."
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

traits.locale_text: "Just look at me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I have holes in my arms. My legs can't support my own weight. If not for these wounds, that freak would have already a pretty new hole adorning his head. It's not the dying I'm afraid of, mind you—it's missing the mark."
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

traits.locale_text: "Just look at me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I have holes in my arms. My legs can't support my own weight. If not for these wounds, that freak would have already a pretty new hole adorning his head. It's not the dying I'm afraid of, mind you—it's missing the mark."
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

traits.locale_text: "Just look at me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I have holes in my arms. My legs can't support my weight. If not for these wounds, that freak would already have a pretty new hole in his head. It's not the dying I'm afraid of, mind you — it's missing the mark."
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

traits.locale_text: "Just look at me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I have holes in my arms. My legs can't support my weight. If not for these wounds, that freak would already have a pretty new hole in his head. It's not the dying I'm afraid of, mind you — it's missing the mark."
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

languages.text: 「陛下、私を見てください。腕には穴が開いているし、足は体を支えることができません。この傷がなければ、あの化け物の頭には今頃きれいな風穴が開いていたことでしょう。私が恐れているのは死ではなく、失敗することなのです」
languages.original_text: "Just look at me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I have holes in my arms. My legs can't support my weight. If not for these wounds, that freak would already have a pretty new hole in his head. It's not the dying I'm afraid of, mind you — it's missing the mark."

traits.locale_text: 「陛下、私を見てください。腕には穴が開いているし、足は体を支えることができません。この傷がなければ、あの化け物の頭には今頃きれいな風穴が開いていたことでしょう。私が恐れているのは死ではなく、失敗することなのです」
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

languages.text: “看看我的样子吧，大人。我的胳膊上到处都是洞，腿连自己的身体都支撑不住。要不是因为受了这么重的伤，我早就在那个王八蛋脑袋上开个大洞了。我想提醒您，我没杀他不是因为我怕死，而是因为我怕失手没干掉他。”
languages.original_text: "Just look at me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I have holes in my arms. My legs can't support my weight. If not for these wounds, that freak would already have a pretty new hole in his head. It's not the dying I'm afraid of, mind you — it's missing the mark."

traits.locale_text: “看看我的样子吧，大人。我的胳膊上到处都是洞，腿连自己的身体都支撑不住。要不是因为受了这么重的伤，我早就在那个王八蛋脑袋上开个大洞了。我想提醒您，我没杀他不是因为我怕死，而是因为我怕失手没干掉他。”
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

languages.text: «Basta con mirarme. Tengo agujeros en los brazos. Mis piernas no pueden soportar mi propio peso. Si no fuera por estas heridas, ese engendro ya tendría un bonito agujero nuevo adornando su cabeza. No es morir lo que temo, sino no dar en el blanco».
languages.original_text: "Just look at me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I have holes in my arms. My legs can't support my weight. If not for these wounds, that freak would already have a pretty new hole in his head. It's not the dying I'm afraid of, mind you — it's missing the mark."

traits.locale_text: «Basta con mirarme. Tengo agujeros en los brazos. Mis piernas no pueden soportar mi propio peso. Si no fuera por estas heridas, ese engendro ya tendría un bonito agujero nuevo adornando su cabeza. No es morir lo que temo, sino no dar en el blanco».
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

languages.text: "Seht mich doch an, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Ich habe Löcher in den Armen. Meine Beine können mein Körpergewicht nicht tragen. Ohne diese Wunden hätte dieser Freak schon ein hübsches neues Loch im Kopf. Ich habe keine Angst vorm Sterben, wisst Ihr? Sondern davor, danebenzuschießen."
languages.original_text: "Just look at me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I have holes in my arms. My legs can't support my weight. If not for these wounds, that freak would already have a pretty new hole in his head. It's not the dying I'm afraid of, mind you — it's missing the mark."

traits.locale_text: "Seht mich doch an, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Ich habe Löcher in den Armen. Meine Beine können mein Körpergewicht nicht tragen. Ohne diese Wunden hätte dieser Freak schon ein hübsches neues Loch im Kopf. Ich habe keine Angst vorm Sterben, wisst Ihr? Sondern davor, danebenzuschießen."
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

languages.text: « Regardez-moi, Votre Seigneurie. J'ai des trous dans les bras, et mes jambes sont incapables de supporter mon poids. Sans ces blessures, autant vous dire que cet escroc aurait un trou à la place de la tête depuis bien longtemps. Ce n'est pas que j'ai peur de mourir, hein. J'ai surtout peur de mal viser. »
languages.original_text: "Just look at me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I have holes in my arms. My legs can't support my weight. If not for these wounds, that freak would already have a pretty new hole in his head. It's not the dying I'm afraid of, mind you — it's missing the mark."

traits.locale_text: « Regardez-moi, Votre Seigneurie. J'ai des trous dans les bras, et mes jambes sont incapables de supporter mon poids. Sans ces blessures, autant vous dire que cet escroc aurait un trou à la place de la tête depuis bien longtemps. Ce n'est pas que j'ai peur de mourir, hein. J'ai surtout peur de mal viser. »
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

languages.text: "Bana bir baksanıza {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, kollarım delik deşik olmuş. Bacaklarım ağırlığımı taşıyamıyor. Bu yaralar olmasaydı o ucubenin alnının tam ortasına şöyle güzelce bir delik açmıştım. Bilmenizi isterim ki ölmekten değil, hedefi tutturamamaktan korkuyorum."
languages.original_text: "Just look at me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I have holes in my arms. My legs can't support my weight. If not for these wounds, that freak would already have a pretty new hole in his head. It's not the dying I'm afraid of, mind you — it's missing the mark."

traits.locale_text: "Bana bir baksanıza {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, kollarım delik deşik olmuş. Bacaklarım ağırlığımı taşıyamıyor. Bu yaralar olmasaydı o ucubenin alnının tam ortasına şöyle güzelce bir delik açmıştım. Bilmenizi isterim ki korktuğum şey ölmek değil, hedefi tutturamamak."
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis
